page.description: The page to navigate to when the user logs in successfully.

discussion.p: If the *[ui:After login behavior]* property is set to "RedirectToTargetPage", the *[ui:Redirect page]* property is shown. This property defines what page to navigate to after the user successfully logs into the application. The page must be explicitly defined and can be any page in your project. If the application will be run on the Classic Application Server, you can use the special <Default> placeholder to use the redirect page defined in the Security Settings.

description.p: A page in the project. E.g. *[index.a5w]* or *[myapp.a5w]*.
Redirects to the page set in the Security Settings [Redirect page after login] property.
